item.title: First Pinebook Pro Impressions
item.author: rwalt@pm.me (Ryan W. Walter)
item.description: My Experience with the Pinebook Pro I recently obtained a Pinebook Pro with an ANSI Keyboard. My goal was to obtain a device that is not only an affordable, long lasting battery for conferences like Texas Linux Fest. But a laptop that I could use every day for editing, composing, and accessing remote environments. Unboxing The device was shipped with all of its components and accessories in a large cargo envelope.
